segment.source: How to Create or Edit the mof Files
segment.target: How to Create or Edit the mof Files

segment.source: How to Create or Edit the mof Files
segment.target: How to Create or Edit the mof Files

segment.source: How to Create or Edit the mof Files
segment.target: How to Create or Edit the mof Files

segment.source: Before you install Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) with Configuration Manager, you need to edit the Configuration.mof file.
segment.target: Before you install Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) with Configuration Manager, you need to edit the Configuration.mof file.

segment.source: You also need to either edit or create the Smsdef.mof file, depending on which version of Configuration Manager you are using.
segment.target: You also need to either edit or create the Smsdef.mof file, depending on which version of Configuration Manager you are using.

segment.source: To enable the client computers to report BitLocker compliance details through the MBAM Configuration Manager reports, you have to edit the Configuration.mof file for Microsoft System Center Configuration Manager 2007 and System Center 2012 Configuration Manager.
segment.target: To enable the client computers to report BitLocker compliance details through the MBAM Configuration Manager reports, you have to edit the Configuration.mof file for Microsoft System Center Configuration Manager 2007 and System Center 2012 Configuration Manager.

segment.source: Create or Edit the Smsdef.mof File
segment.target: Create or Edit the Smsdef.mof File

segment.source: To enable the client computers to report BitLocker compliance details in the MBAM Configuration Manager reports, you have to create or edit the Smsdef.mof file.
segment.target: To enable the client computers to report BitLocker compliance details in the MBAM Configuration Manager reports, you have to create or edit the Smsdef.mof file.

segment.source: In Configuration Manager 2007, the file already exists, so you need to edit, but not overwrite, the existing file.
segment.target: In Configuration Manager 2007, the file already exists, so you need to edit, but not overwrite, the existing file.

segment.source: If you are using System Center 2012 Configuration Manager, you must create the file.
segment.target: If you are using System Center 2012 Configuration Manager, you must create the file.

segment.source: Create or Edit the Smsdef.mof File
segment.target: Create or Edit the Smsdef.mof File
